title: Android app deals of the day: Layton’s Mystery Journey, Tiny Little Kingdoms, and more
content:
It is now time for Tuesday’s best Android game and app deals. Just be sure to check out all of our ongoing Samsung offers as well as these Hisense 2021 U8G ULED 120Hz Android TVs, but for now it’s time for the Google Play app deals. Our collection is headlined by titles like Layton’s Mystery Journey, Tiny Little Kingdoms, Forever Lost: Episode 3, Teach Your Monster to Read, Dead Bunker 2 HD, and more. Head below for a closer look at all of today’s best Android app deals.
